# HRPM.org â€” Human Rights Protection & Monitoring

> Documenting injustice, demanding accountability.

HRPM.org is a non-profit, open-source investigative intelligence platform dedicated to exposing human rights violations through verified evidence, legal documentation, and AI-powered analysis.

## What This Platform Does

- Documents institutional failures and human rights violations
- Maps complex entity relationships (individuals, organizations, government bodies)
- Provides litigation-grade intelligence for legal advocacy
- Maintains a public case law library and legal research database
- Publishes daily AI-generated investigative reports
- Offers open-access REST APIs for all investigation data

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://hrpm.org/
- About / Mission: https://hrpm.org/who-what-why
- Active Cases: https://hrpm.org/cases
- Investigation Timeline: https://hrpm.org/timeline
- Intel Dashboard: https://hrpm.org/dashboard
- Entity Network: https://hrpm.org/network
- Evidence Matrix: https://hrpm.org/evidence
- Blog & Reports: https://hrpm.org/blog
- Legal Research: https://hrpm.org/legal-research
- International Rights Analysis: https://hrpm.org/international
- Documentation: https://hrpm.org/docs
- API Reference: https://hrpm.org/api
- Contact: https://hrpm.org/contact

## Data Access

All investigation data is public domain and available via multiple channels:

### REST API (JSON)
- Base URL: https://ccdyqmjvzzoftzbzbqlu.supabase.co/functions/v1/public-api
- No authentication required for read endpoints
- Supports: cases, events, entities, violations, claims, precedents, blog posts, stats
- Documentation: https://hrpm.org/api

### Data Feeds
- RSS 2.0: https://ccdyqmjvzzoftzbzbqlu.supabase.co/functions/v1/case-rss-feed?format=rss
- Atom 1.0: https://ccdyqmjvzzoftzbzbqlu.supabase.co/functions/v1/case-rss-feed?format=atom
- JSON Feed 1.1: https://ccdyqmjvzzoftzbzbqlu.supabase.co/functions/v1/case-rss-feed?format=json

### Feed Types
- All Updates: ?type=all (default)
- Cases Only: ?type=cases
- Blog Reports: ?type=blog
- Timeline Events: ?type=events
- Case-Specific: ?caseId={UUID}

## Technology

- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, D3.js
- Backend: PostgreSQL, Edge Functions (Deno)
- AI: Gemini-powered document analysis and report generation
- Open Source: https://github.com/BackCheck/justice-unveiled

## Contact

- General: contact@hrpm.org
- Security: security@hrpm.org
